page.title: 17Religion
page.content: METHODIST CHAPEL Thorns Corner. Worship and Sunday School each Sunday. 60 adult members, 20 Sunday School members. Holds Sunday Sch Anniversary, Church Anniversary, Harvest Festival and Carol Service. PARISH CHURCH All Saints, 12th century. Services: daily, and every Sunday Holy Communion (also Saints & Festival Days). Sunday School. 80 on electroral roll. P.C.C. meets first Thursday each quarter. Clare Deanery, Diocese St Edmundsbury & Ipswich. UNITED REFORMED CHURCH Meeting Green. Worship and Sunday School each Sunday. Fellowship meetings every Thursday. 50 membership. Holds Sunday School Anniversary, Sports, Seaside Outings, Garden Parties, Concerts and Coffee Evenings.
